es.csic.iiia.bms.factors
Class IndependentFactor<T>

java.lang.Object
  es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.AbstractFactor<T>
      es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.IndependentFactor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the factor's identity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Factor<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SaturationFactor, SaturationKFactor
public class IndependentFactor<T>
extends AbstractFactor<T>

Factor that includes an independent cost/utility for each of the variables in its scope (its neighbors).

Author:
Marc Pujol

run

public long run()
Run an iteration of this factor. In this case, this amounts to sending the cost associated to each of its neighbors out.

Returns:
number of Constraint Checks performed by this node.
